Hero.Hero_PodTalk_StartArea001:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="5de73672bc294eba91da042de0ed4abf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Call"/][Sound:PlayVoice Key="Vo_Area500_OlimarRecovery"/]This is [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="CaptainOlimar"/]Captain Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] of the S.S. Dolphin.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5de73672bc294eba91da042de0ed4abf" Scale="1"/]I am currently stranded on an unknown
planet,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] trying to recover the ship parts
that were lost during the crash.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5de73672bc294eba91da042de0ed4abf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]My space suit's life-support system will
only last about...[etc:Wait frame="8"/][System:Color name="Warning" ]15 more days[System:Color name="Default"].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5de73672bc294eba91da042de0ed4abf" Scale="1"/]So I must repair the S.S. Dolphin and
escape from this planet before it expires.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5de73672bc294eba91da042de0ed4abf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]To find the missing ship parts,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'll enlist
the help of the Pikmin...
Hero.Hero_PodTalk_StartArea002:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="7deb661327914d919a5740320db0c5bb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Call"/]I've just discovered the most beautiful
area...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] There's something magical about
these pink petals falling from the sky.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7deb661327914d919a5740320db0c5bb" Scale="1"/]I shall call this place [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Blossoming Arcadia[System:Color name="Default"].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7deb661327914d919a5740320db0c5bb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Silly me![etc:Wait frame="8"/] This is no time to get all
sentimental.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I have to keep looking
for those ship parts.
Hero.Hero_PodTalk_StartArea003:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f32d3370e4674871b999d2198c1507ea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Call"/]I seem to have stumbled across this
planet's seaâ€”or one of them.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] But where
are the waves?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's so peaceful.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f32d3370e4674871b999d2198c1507ea" Scale="1"/]I'll call this place...[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Serene Shores[System:Color name="Default"].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f32d3370e4674871b999d2198c1507ea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]It will take a while to explore the area
with all this water.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'll need a proper
strategy to find all my ship parts.
Hero.Hero_Area002_DiscoveryLucky:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c840b1e7936240f2a1a5c2a256a2d798" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitQuestion"/]Oh![etc:Wait frame="8"/] What is this creature?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c840b1e7936240f2a1a5c2a256a2d798" Scale="1"/]It doesn't look like it's going to attack...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
Is something the matter with it?
Hero.Hero_Area002_EncountLucky_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="198ab4a5cee344ecb5500d68b060f3f5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Perhaps it's hungry?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] There may be
something in my pack that I could
feed it...
Hero.Hero_Area002_EncountLucky_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:ResetMotion enable="1"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="4e70d8bb8cd845cd9af46bc5e2fe6532" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitGlad"/]Oh![etc:Wait frame="8"/] It looks like you thought that was
yummy![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm glad to see you've perked up.
Hero.Hero_Area002_EncountLucky_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="d566a761765f456c9ef3ad989bd8b91d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Wait"/]This creature reminds me of a dog.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It seems to be quite taken with me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d566a761765f456c9ef3ad989bd8b91d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitGladNoVoice"/]And I'm taken with that fascinating green
fur...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I think I'll name you...[etc:Wait frame="15"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
Hero.Hero_Area001_Discovery_FirstParts: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="8977b5b1226b4647b9e2057d91e18e45" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitGlad"/]Aha![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Look![etc:Wait frame="8"/] It's a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]part [System:Color name="Default"]from the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]S.S. Dolphin[System:Color name="Default"]!
Hero.Hero_CollectPod_FirstCollectParts:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="1961fce3977c4b3d919ff1aef98be8b1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitGlad"/]That's one down![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Let's hope I can keep up
this pace and collect the rest of the parts
just as quickly!
Hero.Hero_CollectPod_UnlockArea002:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="34e31a00e005467faf5bf6411fb9e3b0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Excellent![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Now I can use the S.S. Dolphin
to broaden our search.
Hero.Hero_CollectPod_UnlockArea003:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9f5cb2c9ef2142a5bcb02ecef114150a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]OK![etc:Wait frame="15"/] After all these repairs,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the engine
output should allow us to go even further![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9f5cb2c9ef2142a5bcb02ecef114150a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitGladNoVoice"/]I'm starting to see the faintest
glimmer of hope!
Hero.Hero_CollectPod_UnlockArea010:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c1452b9efc854c5fb0b8a8e98710fc86" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]At last![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I've collected all the ship parts
in this area.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c1452b9efc854c5fb0b8a8e98710fc86" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitGladNoVoice"/]I'm only a few pieces away from a fully
repaired S.S. Dolphin.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c1452b9efc854c5fb0b8a8e98710fc86" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I suppose tomorrow I'll explore a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]new area[System:Color name="Default"]
to locate the remaining parts.
Hero.Hero_CollectPod_CollectParts30:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="4ef92e53c4d04136af48bf5b5efde7b9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitGlad"/][Sound:PlayVoice Key="Vo_Hero_CollectParts30"/]I've done it...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've done it![etc:Wait frame="15"/] The S.S. Dolphin
is fully repaired![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4ef92e53c4d04136af48bf5b5efde7b9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitGladNoVoice"/]Finally![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'll be able to escape this planet![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4ef92e53c4d04136af48bf5b5efde7b9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Roger"/]The time has come to head home![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm going
back to Hocotate...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]back to my family.
Hero.Hero_HurryUp_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="1cbf92d654764584a406838fc9f9282f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="NoMotionTalk"/]Time flies,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] doesn't it?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Better get back
to the S.S. Dolphin before dark.
Hero.Hero_HurryUp_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="8b7ba0416526438d94d174948688461c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="NoMotionTalk"/]I think I'll call it a day here.
Hero.Hero_StatePikminGuruguru:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c4ec7ee60f834f2a9e87b93ab58e2212" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitQuestion"/]Huh?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] There's a problem with the Pikmin...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Can't they go any further?
Hero.Hero_StateLuckyGuruguru:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="835343dde4d84e1f9c42fc898f67355f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Wait"/]It looks like [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] isn't able to go any
further.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I need to do something.
Hero.Hero_StateOlimarGuruguru:
[Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="58377b757ad24f1ba285e45e47b461f7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitSad"/]Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] this is a problem.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I can't move
any further.
Hero.Hero_Pikmin_ZenmetuA: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="5d9d85b6302545ee9a3e5a9253948cc0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Nooo![etc:Wait frame="8"/] The Pikmin...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]they're...
Hero.Hero_Pikmin_ZenmetuTypeLost: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="379ddcc9a19c4804b4a74252de85ef2b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]No,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] no![etc:Wait frame="15"/] The [Carrot:AnnihilationPikminName/] are...
Hero.Hero_Pikmin_ZenmetuB: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="cf2a9729511a4876a7fa8dc2601ed889" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I guess I'm back to square one...
Hero.Hero_Pikmin_ZenmetuC:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b493d17b8f3b4013994ba93efbbc86db" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Oh no![etc:Wait frame="8"/] The Pikmin are...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b493d17b8f3b4013994ba93efbbc86db" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]And no others are coming out of the Onion
either.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If only I could turn back the clock...
Hero.Hero_OlimarDown_01: [Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="87cb7bc443ea431a906dd317c74af53f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Grm...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] No...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Not here...
Hero.Hero_OlimarDown_02: [Npc:Icon chara="HeroOlimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="183667dbc7eb4844a62b7d083359c926" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Meet me back at the S.S. Dolphin...
Hero.Hero_LuckyDown_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="827f800891414610a32694ca758a3dfb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Oh no![etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You're...
Hero.Hero_LuckyDown_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="b54e1ee6c85243e599a1753c9fd5d593" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I'm sorry, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'll pick you up later,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] OK?
Hero.Hero_GameOver:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="dc560915e029451e86a4fe69a8c6e515" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitSad"/]I was so very close...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If only I knew how
to turn back the clock.
Hero.Hero_Area010_Defeat_Hari:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="20dce98d622a4f75beb06ab5c6b2391f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/][Sound:PlayVoice Key="Vo_Hero_Area010_Defeat_Hari"/]It's the Interstellar Radio![etc:Wait frame="15"/] We located it
at last![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="20dce98d622a4f75beb06ab5c6b2391f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]With this back in my possession,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I can
finally call for help!
Hero.Hero_Area010_Appearance_NiseBoss:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="04a91196b7f34c63b9761032946c7c94" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitQuestion"/]Huh?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] When did that creature show up?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="04a91196b7f34c63b9761032946c7c94" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]Could it be the reason why the Pikmin
and the Onion are acting so weird?
Hero.Hero_Area010_Defeat_NiseBoss:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c52bddcd931a410abff32224f371c72a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Thank goodness![etc:Wait frame="15"/] The Pikmin and Onion
seem to be back to normal.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c52bddcd931a410abff32224f371c72a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Now it's time to transport that precious
Interstellar Radio!
Hero.Hero_PodTalk_3DayLeft:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="6774f1c439bc48b1ad4139db27ca8507" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Call"/]My life-support system will run out
in [System:Color name="Warning" ]3 days[System:Color name="Default"].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6774f1c439bc48b1ad4139db27ca8507" Scale="1"/]I can't afford to dillydally.
Hero.Hero_PodTalk_3DayLeft_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="382fd06324914be68b43c026f3fe30f9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Call"/]My life-support system will run out
in [System:Color name="Warning" ]3 days[System:Color name="Default"].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="382fd06324914be68b43c026f3fe30f9" Scale="1"/]There's no point in panicking.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I need to
keep a clear head and search for the
ship parts,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] one step at a time...
Hero.Hero_PodTalk_2DayLeft:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="968563b0683445d6b2747cba9765763c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Call"/]Just [System:Color name="Warning" ]2 days [System:Color name="Default"]left...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I might need to pick
up the pace.
Hero.Hero_PodTalk_2DayLeft_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="20fb3c967f0b4327a1ca6c0bdba0e5b6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Call"/][System:Color name="Warning" ]Tomorrow[System:Color name="Default"] my time will be up...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Today I'll
just focus on this area.
Hero.Hero_PodTalk_1DayLeft:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="fcdb60ea45d84cdcac5e71855fdb6ccd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Call"/]The day has come.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [System:Color name="Warning" ]After today[System:Color name="Default"],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my life-
support system will no longer be able
to sustain me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fcdb60ea45d84cdcac5e71855fdb6ccd" Scale="1"/]Even if I'm unable to gather all the missing
ship parts,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'll have to take my chances
and launch into space regardless.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fcdb60ea45d84cdcac5e71855fdb6ccd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]At this point,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I have no choice.
Hero.Hero_PodTalk_1DayLeft_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="0e4f99b54f1b4ae6b157b1e9d63e176e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Call"/]The day has come.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] [System:Color name="Warning" ]After today[System:Color name="Default"],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my life-
support system will no longer be able
to sustain me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0e4f99b54f1b4ae6b157b1e9d63e176e" Scale="1"/]Even if I'm unable to gather all the missing
ship parts,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'll have to take my chances
and launch into space regardless.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0e4f99b54f1b4ae6b157b1e9d63e176e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I wish I could go back to that pivotal day...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Wouldn't that be nice?
Hero.Hero_GoodEnding_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="539661b5e92543e2be45a40ff8e38b73" Scale="1"/]The takeoff was a success.
But as I exited this planet's atmosphere...
Hero.Hero_GoodEnding_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="3c261fb66bbe44f5990bedfccd68a504" Scale="1"/]I realized that [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] had snuck onto
the ship, and she was clearly suffering.
Hero.Hero_GoodEnding_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="5607a146294c4760a804ebb849ab38d2" Scale="1"/]I rushed to turn the ship
around and tried to land.
Hero.Hero_GoodEnding_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f5a9a9ecf1cb47ae9e7e086e26c6eafe" Scale="1"/]But at that very moment,
my life-support system failed.
Hero.Hero_BadEnding_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="95e62b741ada487cbbd30c8e3b197a0c" Scale="1"/]I attempted a takeoff with
the S.S. Dolphin still in disrepair.
Hero.Hero_BadEnding_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="62d026726849468abb5b2ed74af16c80" Scale="1"/]But despite my desperate hopes and
optimism, it came crashing down yet again.
